original: ma brtags par byed cing chos lugs dang mi ldan pa yin /
analyzed: ma brtags par byed cing chos lugs dang mi ldan pa yin /
translated: He acts without examining and is not in accord with the Dharma.

original: chos la mi lta ba yin /
analyzed: chos la mi lta ba yin /
translated: He does not look at the Dharma.

original: bye brag mi shes shing byas pa mi gzo ba yin /
analyzed: bye brag mi shes shing byas pa mi gzo ba yin /
translated: He does not know the difference between things and is not grateful.

original: rab tu myos shing gcig tu bag med par spyod pa yin no //
analyzed: rab tu myos shing gcig tu bag med par spyod pa yin no //
translated: He is very confused and behaves with total lack of consideration.

original: ji ltar na rigs mi btsun pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na rigs mi btsun pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is he of low birth?

original: 'di la rgyal po rgyal po'i rigs shin tu dman pa rkyen du 'bab pa ma yin par skyes pa'am /🔽rgyal po'i rigs de nyid du bran mo'i bu'am /
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po rgyal po'i rigs shin tu dman pa rkyen du 'bab pa ma yin par skyes pa'am / rgyal po'i rigs de nyid du bran mo'i bu'am /
translated: He is born into a royal family that is very low, not fit to be a condition for the king.

original: mi 'dra ba'i bur skyes pa'am /
analyzed: mi 'dra ba'i bur skyes pa'am /
translated: Or he is born into that very royal family as the son of a slave woman,

original: tshal za'am / blo grogs sam /
analyzed: tshal za'am / blo grogs sam /
translated: or as the son of a concubine.🔽He is born as the son of a minister, a counselor,

original: blon po'am / gros grogs kyi bur skyes pa yin te /
analyzed: blon po'am / gros grogs kyi bur skyes pa yin te /
translated: or a chief minister.

original: de ltar na rigs mi btsun pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rigs mi btsun pa yin no //
translated: Thus he is of low birth.

original: ji ltar na rang dbang med pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na rang dbang med pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is he not independent?

original: 'di la rgyal po la las tshal za dang / blo grogs dang / blon po dang / gros grogs @152a * //
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po la las tshal za dang / blo grogs dang / blon po dang / gros grogs @152a * //
translated: The king is not independent because he is advised in this way and that by his ministers, counselors, chief ministers,

original: dag de lta de ltar thabs ston pas de rang gi bya ba dag bya ba dang / tshal za rnams gso ba dang / ci 'dod pa bzhin du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba'am /
analyzed: dag de lta de ltar thabs ston pas de rang gi bya ba dag bya ba dang / tshal za rnams gso ba dang / ci 'dod pa bzhin du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba'am /
translated: and his inner and outer retinue. He is not free to do whatever he wants to do, to eat whatever he wants to eat, to enjoy the five sensory pleasures as he wishes,🔽or to give gifts, to guard his morality, or to practice generosity.

original: dga' ba'am / dga' dgur spyod pa la 'dod dgur byed du mi ster ba yin te /
analyzed: dga' ba'am / dga' dgur spyod pa la 'dod dgur byed du mi ster ba yin te /
translated: He is not free to enjoy himself as he wishes.

original: de ltar na rgyal po rang dbang med pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyal po rang dbang med pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the king is not independent.

original: ji ltar na rgyal po rang bzhin gyis gtum pa yin zhe na /🔽'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams sam /
analyzed: ji ltar na rgyal po rang bzhin gyis gtum pa yin zhe na / 'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams sam /
translated: How is it that the king is naturally cruel?🔽Here, the king, for some reason, becomes angry with the people of the country

original: gzhan dag gis gzhi 'ga' kho na zhig la yid du mi 'ong ba'i dngos po ci yang rung ba cung zhig kun tu spyad pa na /🔽mngon sum du smra 'bebs par byed /🔽tshig rtsub po rjod par byed /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis gzhi 'ga' kho na zhig la yid du mi 'ong ba'i dngos po ci yang rung ba cung zhig kun tu spyad pa na / mngon sum du smra 'bebs par byed / tshig rtsub po rjod par byed /
translated: or with others, and he punishes them.🔽He speaks harshly.

original: ngan par byed /
analyzed: ngan par byed /
translated: He acts badly.

original: 'khrug par byed /
analyzed: 'khrug par byed /
translated: He is agitated.

original: gnod par byed /
analyzed: gnod par byed /
translated: He is harmful.🔽He is in a bad mood.

original: yul yul por gnas par byed cing /🔽'khrug pa kun du skyed par byed pa dang / gal te mngon sum du ma yin na yang lkog tu gzhan dag gi drung du brjod pa dang / gal te mngon sum du yang ma yin /
analyzed: yul yul por gnas par byed cing / 'khrug pa kun du skyed par byed pa dang / gal te mngon sum du ma yin na yang lkog tu gzhan dag gi drung du brjod pa dang / gal te mngon sum du yang ma yin /
translated: He creates disturbances.🔽If he is not face to face with them, he speaks about them behind their backs.

original: lkog tu gzhan dag gi drung du na yang ma yin mod kyi /
analyzed: lkog tu gzhan dag gi drung du na yang ma yin mod kyi /
translated: If he is not face to face with them, nor does he speak about them behind their backs,

original: nang du yid kyis rab tu 'khrug pa mi mngon par kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang / khon du 'dzin pa'i sems bskyed la /
analyzed: nang du yid kyis rab tu 'khrug pa mi mngon par kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang / khon du 'dzin pa'i sems bskyed la /
translated: Internally, he does not display mental agitation, but he harbors a hostile mind and a mind of resentment.🔽He does not generate or hold on to thoughts of agitation for a long time.

original: 'khrug pa'i bsam pa yun ring por ni mi bskyed mi 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang nang du yid kyis 'khrug pa mi mngon par byed cing /
analyzed: 'khrug pa'i bsam pa yun ring por ni mi bskyed mi 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang nang du yid kyis 'khrug pa mi mngon par byed cing /
translated: Moreover, he does not display mental agitation internally,

original: kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan la /
analyzed: kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan la /
translated: but he harbors a hostile mind.

original: khon gyi bsam pa dang / 'khrug pa'i bsam pa yun ring por skyed cing 'dzin par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: khon gyi bsam pa dang / 'khrug pa'i bsam pa yun ring por skyed cing 'dzin par byed pa yin te /
translated: He generates and holds on to thoughts of resentment and agitation for a long time.

original: de ltar na rnam pa de dag gis mngon sum du gtum pa dang / lkog na gtum pa dang / mi mngon par gtum pa dang / yun thung ngur gtum pa dang / yun ring por gtum pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa de dag gis mngon sum du gtum pa dang / lkog na gtum pa dang / mi mngon par gtum pa dang / yun thung ngur gtum pa dang / yun ring por gtum pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: In this way, by these aspects, he is directly aggressive, covertly aggressive, and covertly aggressive; he is aggressive for a short time and aggressive for a long time.

original: rgyal po rang bzhin gyis gtum pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rgyal po rang bzhin gyis gtum pa zhes bya ste /
translated: This is called the king who is naturally aggressive.

original: rgyal po chen po de la yun ring por gtum pa ni kha na ma tho ba chen po dang bcas pa yin la /
analyzed: rgyal po chen po de la yun ring por gtum pa ni kha na ma tho ba chen po dang bcas pa yin la /
translated: Great king, being aggressive for a long time is associated with a great offense.

original: gzhan ni de lta ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni de lta ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The other kings are not like that.

original: ji ltar na 'khrug pa'i shas che ba yin zhe na /🔽'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams nyes pa chung ngu dang 'gal ba chung ngu dag gis kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du longs spyod dag dang bral bar byed /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'khrug pa'i shas che ba yin zhe na / 'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams nyes pa chung ngu dang 'gal ba chung ngu dag gis kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du longs spyod dag dang bral bar byed /
translated: How is a king one who is very agitated?

original: chung ma dag dang bral bar byed cing /🔽chad pa mchog gis kyang rjes su bstan par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: chung ma dag dang bral bar byed cing / chad pa mchog gis kyang rjes su bstan par byed pa yin te /
translated: In this case, a king who is a tathāgata punishes even minor offenses and even minor transgressions with the severest penalties, and he does not tolerate any kind of misconduct.🔽He is not one who is easily pleased and is not easily satisfied.🔽He is not one who is easily pleased and is not easily satisfied.

original: de ltar na rgyal po 'khrug pa'i shas che ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyal po 'khrug pa'i shas che ba yin no //
translated: In this way, a king is one who is very agitated.

original: ji ltar na bya dga' chung ba @152b yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na bya dga' chung ba @152b yin zhe na /
translated: How is a king one who is stingy with rewards?

original: 'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams kyis bkur sti dang ; bsnyen bkur gyis dga' bar byas mgu bar byas su zin kyang /
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams kyis bkur sti dang ; bsnyen bkur gyis dga' bar byas mgu bar byas su zin kyang /
translated: In this case, a king who is a tathāgata does not give rewards to his retinue and army that are incomplete, improper, or untimely.

original: tshig 'jam po cung zad cung zad tsam las mi brjod cing longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' yang yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshul dang mthun par mi byed /
analyzed: tshig 'jam po cung zad cung zad tsam las mi brjod cing longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' yang yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshul dang mthun par mi byed /
translated: He does not give rewards that are small or insignificant.

original: 'tsho ba'i bgo bsha' yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshul dang mthun par mi byed la /
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i bgo bsha' yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshul dang mthun par mi byed la /
translated: He does not share the entire wealth in a proper way.

original: de yang dbri bskyung byas bskyang ba byas /🔽gya gyu byas /
analyzed: de yang dbri bskyung byas bskyang ba byas / gya gyu byas /
translated: He does not maintain it by reducing and restraining himself.🔽He does not maintain it by being crooked.

original: yi chad par byas nas byed pa yin te /
analyzed: yi chad par byas nas byed pa yin te /
translated: He does not maintain it by being discouraged.

original: de ltar na rgyal po bya dga' chung ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyal po bya dga' chung ba yin no //
translated: In this way, the king has little generosity.

original: ji ltar na dam pa ma yin pa rnams kyi ngag nyan pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na dam pa ma yin pa rnams kyi ngag nyan pa yin zhe na /
translated: “How does he listen to the words of those who are not holy?

original: 'di la rgyal po gang zag mkhas pa ma yin par mkhas par rlom pa /🔽brkam chags can /
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po gang zag mkhas pa ma yin par mkhas par rlom pa / brkam chags can /
translated: Here the king is not a wise person but thinks he is wise.🔽He is greedy.

original: nye mgon byed pa /
analyzed: nye mgon byed pa /
translated: He is a partisan.

original: tshul mi shes pa /
analyzed: tshul mi shes pa /
translated: He does not know what is proper.

original: 'khu bar byed pa /
analyzed: 'khu bar byed pa /
translated: He is treacherous.

original: chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i gang zag rnams kyi tshig mnyan pa dang / bya bar sems shing des na de bya ba dag las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur /🔽longs spyod dag las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i gang zag rnams kyi tshig mnyan pa dang / bya bar sems shing des na de bya ba dag las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur / longs spyod dag las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur /
translated: He is not righteous. He listens to the words of such people and thinks he should do what they say. Because of that, he will decline in his actions.🔽He will decline in his enjoyments.

original: grags pa las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur /
analyzed: grags pa las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur /
translated: He will decline in his fame.

original: chos las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: chos las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: He will also fall away from the Dharma.

original: de ltar na rgyal po dam pa ma yin pa rnams kyi ngag nyan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyal po dam pa ma yin pa rnams kyi ngag nyan pa yin no //
translated: In this way, he listens to the words of bad kings.

original: ji ltar na ma brtags par byed cing chos lugs dang mi ldan pa yin zhe na ;
analyzed: ji ltar na ma brtags par byed cing chos lugs dang mi ldan pa yin zhe na ;
translated: “How does he act without examining and without following the Dharma?

original: 'di la rgyal po tshal za mthun par ma bskos /🔽yongs su ma bskos /🔽dmigs su ma phab /
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po tshal za mthun par ma bskos / yongs su ma bskos / dmigs su ma phab /
translated: Here, the king does not appoint the foresters in a way that is appropriate,🔽does not appoint them in a way that is complete,

original: rnam par ma brtags /
analyzed: rnam par ma brtags /
translated: does not appoint them in a way that is well-defined,🔽does not appoint them in a way that is well-examined,

original: kun du ma brtags par don mchog tu yid gcugs par bya ba'i las kyi mtha' de dang de dag tu bsko bar mi 'os pa'i tshal za rnams ni sko bar byed /
analyzed: kun du ma brtags par don mchog tu yid gcugs par bya ba'i las kyi mtha' de dang de dag tu bsko bar mi 'os pa'i tshal za rnams ni sko bar byed /
translated: and does not appoint them in a way that is well-considered. He appoints those foresters who are not suitable to be appointed to this or that task that is of the highest importance.

original: bsko bar 'os pa rnams ni sko bar mi byed /
analyzed: bsko bar 'os pa rnams ni sko bar mi byed /
translated: He does not appoint those who are suitable to be appointed.

original: las kyi mtha' de dang de dag las dbyung bar 'os pa'i tshal za rnams ni 'byin par mi byed /
analyzed: las kyi mtha' de dang de dag las dbyung bar 'os pa'i tshal za rnams ni 'byin par mi byed /
translated: He does not dismiss those foresters who are suitable to be dismissed from this or that task.🔽He dismisses those who are not suitable to be dismissed.

original: dbyung bar mi 'os pa rnams ni 'byin par byed pa dang / mthun par ma bskos /
analyzed: dbyung bar mi 'os pa rnams ni 'byin par byed pa dang / mthun par ma bskos /
translated: He does not appoint in a way that is appropriate,

original: yongs su ma bskos /
analyzed: yongs su ma bskos /
translated: does not appoint in a way that is complete,🔽does not appoint in a way that is well-defined,

original: dmigs su ma phab /
analyzed: dmigs su ma phab /
translated: does not appoint in a way that is well-examined,🔽and does not appoint in a way that is well-considered.

original: rnam par ma brtags /
analyzed: rnam par ma brtags /
translated: It is not a matter of analysis.🔽🔽

original: kun tu ma brtags pas /
analyzed: kun tu ma brtags pas /
translated: He does not investigate and analyze.

original: phan gdags par 'os pa'i tshal za rnams la ni chad pas gcod par byed /
analyzed: phan gdags par 'os pa'i tshal za rnams la ni chad pas gcod par byed /
translated: He does not give benefits to those who deserve to be helped,🔽and he does not punish those who deserve to be punished.

original: chad pas gcad par 'os pa rnams la ni phan 'dogs par byed pa dang / rgyal po rgyal po'i chos lugs gang dag yin pa de dag kyang des tshal za rnams la legs par rnam par ma bzhag pas /
analyzed: chad pas gcad par 'os pa rnams la ni phan 'dogs par byed pa dang / rgyal po rgyal po'i chos lugs gang dag yin pa de dag kyang des tshal za rnams la legs par rnam par ma bzhag pas /
translated: He does not properly establish the royal laws for the nāgas.

original: des na tshal za rnams kyang blon po @153a * //
analyzed: des na tshal za rnams kyang blon po @153a * //
translated: Therefore, the nāgas do not respect the king.

original: chen po dang / 'khor phal cher 'dus te 'dug pa'i tshe /
analyzed: chen po dang / 'khor phal cher 'dus te 'dug pa'i tshe /
translated: When the king is in the midst of his great ministers and his large retinue,🔽he suddenly speaks and does not wait for the end of the conversation.

original: glo bur du gtam zer zhing gtam gyi mjug mi sdod pa dang / rjes ma yin pa dang / gus pa ma yin pa dag smra zhing bya bar yang sems la /
analyzed: glo bur du gtam zer zhing gtam gyi mjug mi sdod pa dang / rjes ma yin pa dang / gus pa ma yin pa dag smra zhing bya bar yang sems la /
translated: He speaks without regard for what comes after and without respect.🔽He thinks about what he should do.

original: ji skad bsgo ba'i tshig bzhin du yang mi byed cing /
analyzed: ji skad bsgo ba'i tshig bzhin du yang mi byed cing /
translated: He does not do what he is told.

original: tshig la legs par gnas pa yang ma yin te /🔽de ltar na rgyal po ma brtags par byed cing /
analyzed: tshig la legs par gnas pa yang ma yin te / de ltar na rgyal po ma brtags par byed cing /
translated: He does not properly follow the words.

original: chos lugs dang mi ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: chos lugs dang mi ldan pa yin no //
translated: In this way, the king acts without investigating and is not endowed with the royal laws.

original: ji ltar na chos la mi lta ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na chos la mi lta ba yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that he does not look to the Dharma?

original: 'di la rgyal po 'jig rten pha rol la ma dad cing yid mi ches pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po 'jig rten pha rol la ma dad cing yid mi ches pa yin te /
translated: Here, the king does not have faith in or confidence about the next world.🔽Since he does not have faith in or confidence about the next world, he does not believe in the results of virtuous and nonvirtuous actions that will occur later in the next life, in what is desired and in what is not desired.

original: de 'jig rten pha rol la ma dad cing yid mi ches pas las dge ba dang / mi dge ba rnams kyi 'bras bu phyis tshe phyi ma la 'dod pa dang mi 'dod par 'gyur ba la yang dad par mi byed pa dang / ma dad pas ngo tsha med cing lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa la ci 'dod dgur 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: de 'jig rten pha rol la ma dad cing yid mi ches pas las dge ba dang / mi dge ba rnams kyi 'bras bu phyis tshe phyi ma la 'dod pa dang mi 'dod par 'gyur ba la yang dad par mi byed pa dang / ma dad pas ngo tsha med cing lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa la ci 'dod dgur 'jug pa dang /
translated: Since he does not have faith, he is shameless and engages in whatever misdeeds he wishes to with his body, speech, and mind.

original: gzhan yang dus dus su so sor brtags nas sbyin pa dag mi sbyin pa dang / bsod nams dag mi byed pa dang / bsnyen gnas la mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba la mi 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang dus dus su so sor brtags nas sbyin pa dag mi sbyin pa dang / bsod nams dag mi byed pa dang / bsnyen gnas la mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba la mi 'jug pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, he does not give gifts after having examined them from time to time, he does not make merit, he does not observe the one-day fasts, and he does not take up the moral observances.

original: de ltar na rgyal po chos la mi lta ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyal po chos la mi lta ba yin no //
translated: In this way, the king does not look to the Dharma.

original: ji ltar na bye brag mi shes shing byas pa mi gzo ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na bye brag mi shes shing byas pa mi gzo ba yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that he does not know the differences and does not repay kindness?

original: 'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams dang / blo grogs rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / gros grogs rnams la sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams dang / blo grogs rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / gros grogs rnams la sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa yin te /
translated: He is mistaken about his retinue, friends, ministers, and advisors.

original: des gus pa las kyang de dag gi bye brag mi shes la /
analyzed: des gus pa las kyang de dag gi bye brag mi shes la /
translated: He does not know the differences between them because of his lack of respect.

original: nus pa dang / shes pa las kyang de dag gi bye brag mi shes te /
analyzed: nus pa dang / shes pa las kyang de dag gi bye brag mi shes te /
translated: He does not know the differences between them because of their abilities and knowledge.

original: de de ltar bye brag mi shes pas tshal za gus pa dang mi ldan pa rnams la ni gus pa dang ldan par 'du shes pa dang / gus pa dang ldan pa rnams la ni gus pa dang mi ldan par 'du shes pa dang / nus pa ma yin pa rnams la ni nus par 'du shes pa dang /
analyzed: de de ltar bye brag mi shes pas tshal za gus pa dang mi ldan pa rnams la ni gus pa dang ldan par 'du shes pa dang / gus pa dang ldan pa rnams la ni gus pa dang mi ldan par 'du shes pa dang / nus pa ma yin pa rnams la ni nus par 'du shes pa dang /
translated: Since he does not know the differences, he perceives those who are not respectful as being respectful, he perceives those who are respectful as being disrespectful, he perceives those who are not capable as being capable, and he perceives those who are capable as being incapable.

original: nus pa rnams la ni nus pa ma yin par 'du shes pa dang / shes rab 'chal pa rnams la ni shes rab dang ldan par 'du shes pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa rnams la ni shes rab 'chal par 'du shes pa dang /🔽de ltar sems phyin ci log tu gyur pas tshal za gus pa dang mi ldan pa rnams dang / nus pa dang mi ldan pa rnams dang shes rab 'chal pa rnams la ni bkur stir byed /
analyzed: nus pa rnams la ni nus pa ma yin par 'du shes pa dang / shes rab 'chal pa rnams la ni shes rab dang ldan par 'du shes pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa rnams la ni shes rab 'chal par 'du shes pa dang / de ltar sems phyin ci log tu gyur pas tshal za gus pa dang mi ldan pa rnams dang / nus pa dang mi ldan pa rnams dang shes rab 'chal pa rnams la ni bkur stir byed /
translated: They perceive those who are wise as being unwise.

original: bla mar byed /🔽ri mor byed /🔽mchod par byed la /
analyzed: bla mar byed / ri mor byed / mchod par byed la /
translated: With their minds thus distorted, they honor, venerate, respect, and make offerings to those who are not capable, those who are not wise, and those who are not endowed with virtue.🔽They disparage those who are capable, those who are wise, and those who are endowed with virtue.

original: gus pa dang @153b ldan pa rnams dang / nus pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / shes rab dang ldan pa rnams la ni khyad du gsod par byed pa dang / de'i tshal za yun ring po nas bsnyen bkur byed byed pa /
analyzed: gus pa dang @153b ldan pa rnams dang / nus pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / shes rab dang ldan pa rnams la ni khyad du gsod par byed pa dang / de'i tshal za yun ring po nas bsnyen bkur byed byed pa /
translated: They serve for a long time those who are not capable, those who are not wise, and those who are not endowed with virtue.

original: sri zhu che ba /
analyzed: sri zhu che ba /
translated: They are very helpful to them.

original: rgan po rgas pa dgog tu phyin pa gang dag yin pa de dag la yang mthu med pa dang / stobs med pa dang / nyams rtsal med par rig nas /
analyzed: rgan po rgas pa dgog tu phyin pa gang dag yin pa de dag la yang mthu med pa dang / stobs med pa dang / nyams rtsal med par rig nas /
translated: “Those who have gone to the old age of old age are powerless, weak, and feeble.

original: bsnyen bkur las kyang khyad du gsod par byed /
analyzed: bsnyen bkur las kyang khyad du gsod par byed /
translated: They are despised even in terms of service.

original: longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' dang / 'tsho ba'i bgo bsha' las kyang khyad du gsod par byed cing /
analyzed: longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' dang / 'tsho ba'i bgo bsha' las kyang khyad du gsod par byed cing /
translated: They are despised even in terms of the distribution of wealth and the distribution of livelihood.

original: gzhan dag gis brnyas na yang yal bar 'dor ba yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis brnyas na yang yal bar 'dor ba yin te /
translated: When others despise them, they are abandoned.

original: de ltar na rgyal po bye brag mi shes shing byas pa mi gzo ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyal po bye brag mi shes shing byas pa mi gzo ba yin no //
translated: In this way, the king does not know the difference and does not repay kindness.

original: ji ltar na rab tu myos shing gcig tu bag med par spyod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na rab tu myos shing gcig tu bag med par spyod pa yin zhe na /
translated: “How is it that he is intoxicated and indulges in carelessness?

original: 'di la rgyal po gcig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas /
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po gcig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas /
translated: Here, the king is endowed and united with the five sense pleasures.

original: rtse bar byed /
analyzed: rtse bar byed /
translated: He plays with them,

original: dga' bar byed /
analyzed: dga' bar byed /
translated: enjoys himself with them,

original: dga' mgur spyod par byed cing dus dus su bya ba dang / tshal za dag gso ba'i phyir brtson par mi byed pa yin te /
analyzed: dga' mgur spyod par byed cing dus dus su bya ba dang / tshal za dag gso ba'i phyir brtson par mi byed pa yin te /
translated: and indulges in them. From time to time, he does not strive to do what needs to be done and to care for the gardens and fields.

original: de ltar na rgyal po rab tu myos shing gcig tu bag med par spyod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyal po rab tu myos shing gcig tu bag med par spyod pa yin no //
translated: In this way, the king is extremely intoxicated and behaves with utter carelessness.

original: rgyal po chen po skyon bcu po de dag dang ldan na rgyal po longs spyod che zhing rtsa 'jing che la 'khor mang du zin kyang skyabs kyi 'os ma yin zhing /
analyzed: rgyal po chen po skyon bcu po de dag dang ldan na rgyal po longs spyod che zhing rtsa 'jing che la 'khor mang du zin kyang skyabs kyi 'os ma yin zhing /
translated: Great King, if a king has these ten faults, even if he has great wealth, a great following, and many attendants, he is not a suitable refuge.

original: mngon du 'gro bar bya ba'i 'os ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon du 'gro bar bya ba'i 'os ma yin no //
translated: He is not a suitable object of devotion.

original: rgyal po chen po rgyal po'i skyon de dag las dang po gcig ni rigs kyi skyon yin no //
analyzed: rgyal po chen po rgyal po'i skyon de dag las dang po gcig ni rigs kyi skyon yin no //
translated: Great King, of those faults of the king, the first is a fault of lineage.

original: de las gzhan pa'i skyon dgu ni rgyal po'i rang bzhin gyi skyon yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i skyon dgu ni rgyal po'i rang bzhin gyi skyon yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The other nine faults should be understood as faults of the king’s nature.

original: de la rgyal po'i yon tan rnams gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rgyal po'i yon tan rnams gang zhe na /
translated: “Great King, what are the king’s good qualities?

original: rgyal po chen po bcu po 'di dag ni rgyal po'i yon tan dag yin te /
analyzed: rgyal po chen po bcu po 'di dag ni rgyal po'i yon tan dag yin te /
translated: Great King, there are ten good qualities of a king.

original: de dag dang ldan na rgyal po longs spyod chen po ma yin zhing rtsa 'jing chen po ma yin la /
analyzed: de dag dang ldan na rgyal po longs spyod chen po ma yin zhing rtsa 'jing chen po ma yin la /
translated: If a king has them, he will not have great wealth, a great following,🔽and many attendants.

original: 'khor mang ba ma yin du zin kyang skyabs kyi 'os yin zhing mngon du bgrod par bya ba'i 'os yin no //
analyzed: 'khor mang ba ma yin du zin kyang skyabs kyi 'os yin zhing mngon du bgrod par bya ba'i 'os yin no //
translated: Even if he does not have a large retinue, he is worthy of being a refuge and worthy of being a guide.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: rigs btsun pa yin /
analyzed: rigs btsun pa yin /
translated: He is of high birth.

original: rang dbang yod pa yin /
analyzed: rang dbang yod pa yin /
translated: He is independent.

original: rang bzhin gyis mi gtum pa yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis mi gtum pa yin /
translated: He is not naturally cruel.

original: 'khrug pa'i shas mi che ba yin /
analyzed: 'khrug pa'i shas mi che ba yin /
translated: He is not very irritable.

original: bya dga' che ba yin /
analyzed: bya dga' che ba yin /
translated: He is very generous.

original: dam pa rnams kyi ngag nyan pa yin /
analyzed: dam pa rnams kyi ngag nyan pa yin /
translated: He listens to the advice of the good.

original: brtags te byed cing chos lugs dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: brtags te byed cing chos lugs dang ldan pa yin /
translated: He acts after careful consideration and is righteous.

original: chos la lta ba yin /
analyzed: chos la lta ba yin /
translated: He is devoted to the Dharma.

original: bye brag shes shing byas pa gzo ba yin /
analyzed: bye brag shes shing byas pa gzo ba yin /
translated: He is discriminating and grateful.

original: rab tu ma myos shing gcig tu bag med par mi spyod pa yin no //
analyzed: rab tu ma myos shing gcig tu bag med par mi spyod pa yin no //
translated: He is not completely heedless and does not act with excessive self-confidence.

original: ji ltar na rigs btsun pa yin zhe na /🔽rgyal po'i rigs 'dra ba'am /🔽mtho bar @154a * //
analyzed: ji ltar na rigs btsun pa yin zhe na / rgyal po'i rigs 'dra ba'am / mtho bar @154a * //
translated: How is he of high birth?🔽He is born into a family that is like a royal family,

original: skyes pa'am / 'dra ba'i bur skyes pa yin te /
analyzed: skyes pa'am / 'dra ba'i bur skyes pa yin te /
translated: or into a family that is like a great minister’s family.

original: de ltar na rigs btsun pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rigs btsun pa yin no //
translated: Thus he is of high birth.

original: ji ltar na rang dbang yod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na rang dbang yod pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is he independent?

original: rgyal po'i bya ba dag bya ba dang / tshal za dag gso ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba'am dga' ba'am dga' dgur spyod pa la rang dgar 'jug cing de'i tshig kyang tshal za rnams dang / blo grogs rnams dang /
analyzed: rgyal po'i bya ba dag bya ba dang / tshal za dag gso ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba'am dga' ba'am dga' dgur spyod pa la rang dgar 'jug cing de'i tshig kyang tshal za rnams dang / blo grogs rnams dang /
translated: He is free to engage in the king’s duties, to care for the people who live in the forest, and to enjoy himself with the five sense pleasures.

original: blon po rnams dang / gros grogs rnams la brtsan par 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: blon po rnams dang / gros grogs rnams la brtsan par 'jug pa yin te /
translated: He is free to speak to the people who live in the forest, his friends, his ministers, and his advisors.

original: de ltar na rang dbang yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rang dbang yod pa yin no //
translated: In this way, he is independent.

original: ji ltar na rang bzhin gyis mi gtum pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na rang bzhin gyis mi gtum pa yin zhe na /
translated: “How is he naturally not violent?

original: 'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams kyis gzhi 'ga' zhig la yid du mi 'ong ba'i dngos po ci yang rung ba ltog po zhig kun tu spyad kyang /
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams kyis gzhi 'ga' zhig la yid du mi 'ong ba'i dngos po ci yang rung ba ltog po zhig kun tu spyad kyang /
translated: Even if the people who live in the forest do something unpleasant to the king,

original: de rang bzhin gyis tshal za rnams la bzod par byed cing /🔽mngon sum du sma 'bebs par mi byed /
analyzed: de rang bzhin gyis tshal za rnams la bzod par byed cing / mngon sum du sma 'bebs par mi byed /
translated: he is naturally patient with them.🔽He does not humiliate them.

original: tshig rtsub mo rjod par mi byed /
analyzed: tshig rtsub mo rjod par mi byed /
translated: He does not speak harshly to them.

original: ngan par mi byed /
analyzed: ngan par mi byed /
translated: He does not treat them badly.

original: 'khrug par mi byed /
analyzed: 'khrug par mi byed /
translated: He does not quarrel with them.

original: gnod par mi byed yul yul por gnas par mi byed cing /
analyzed: gnod par mi byed yul yul por gnas par mi byed cing /
translated: He does not cause harm, does not live in a place that is harmful,

original: 'khrug pa kun du bskyed par mi byed pa dang / lkog na yang ma yin pa dang / nang du yid kyis 'khrug pa'i kun nas dkris pa mi mngon par byed pa dang / khon gyi bsam pa dang / 'khrug pa'i bsam pa yun ring por bskyed cing 'dzin par yang mi byed cing /
analyzed: 'khrug pa kun du bskyed par mi byed pa dang / lkog na yang ma yin pa dang / nang du yid kyis 'khrug pa'i kun nas dkris pa mi mngon par byed pa dang / khon gyi bsam pa dang / 'khrug pa'i bsam pa yun ring por bskyed cing 'dzin par yang mi byed cing /
translated: and does not cause conflict. He does not do so in secret, nor does he keep the inner entanglements of conflict hidden in his mind. He does not give rise to or hold on to thoughts of resentment or conflict for a long time.

original: mngon sum du gtum pa yang ma yin /🔽lkog na gtum pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: mngon sum du gtum pa yang ma yin / lkog na gtum pa yang ma yin /
translated: He is not openly aggressive.🔽He is not secretly aggressive.

original: mi mngon par gtum pa yang ma yin /🔽yun thung ngur gtum pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: mi mngon par gtum pa yang ma yin / yun thung ngur gtum pa yang ma yin /
translated: He is not covertly aggressive.🔽He is not aggressive for a short time.

original: yun ring por gtum pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: yun ring por gtum pa yang ma yin te /
translated: He is not aggressive for a long time.

original: de ltar na rgyal po rang bzhin gyis mi gtum pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyal po rang bzhin gyis mi gtum pa yin no //
translated: In this way, a king is naturally not aggressive.

original: ji ltar na 'khrug pa'i shas chung ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'khrug pa'i shas chung ba yin zhe na /
translated: “How is it that he has little conflict?

original: 'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams nyes pa chen po dang / 'gal ba chen po byas kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du longs spyod dag dang 'bral bar mi byed chung ma dag dang 'bral bar mi byed cing /
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams nyes pa chen po dang / 'gal ba chen po byas kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du longs spyod dag dang 'bral bar mi byed chung ma dag dang 'bral bar mi byed cing /
translated: In this case, even though the king’s subjects commit great and serious offenses, he does not completely deprive them of their possessions or banish them from their homes.

original: chad pa mchog gis kyang rjes su ston par mi byed par de dag la nyes pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i chad pas rjes su ston par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: chad pa mchog gis kyang rjes su ston par mi byed par de dag la nyes pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i chad pas rjes su ston par byed pa yin te /
translated: He does not punish them with the highest penalty, but instead punishes them in a way that is appropriate to their offense.

original: de ltar na rgyal po 'khrug pa'i shas chung ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyal po 'khrug pa'i shas chung ba yin no //
translated: In this way, the king has a low threshold for conflict.

original: ji ltar na bya dga' che ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na bya dga' che ba yin zhe na /
translated: How does the king have a high threshold for rewards?

original: 'di la rgyal po bkur sti dang / bsnyen bkur gyis bsti stang legs par byed byed pa'i tshal za rnams la dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po bkur sti dang / bsnyen bkur gyis bsti stang legs par byed byed pa'i tshal za rnams la dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems dang ldan zhing /
translated: In this case, the king has a happy and pleased mind toward his subjects, who are properly honored with respect and reverence.

original: dus dus su legs par yongs su rdzogs par @154b tshig 'jam po kun du rjod par byed cing /
analyzed: dus dus su legs par yongs su rdzogs par @154b tshig 'jam po kun du rjod par byed cing /
translated: From time to time, he speaks to them in a gentle and pleasant manner.

original: longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' dang / 'tsho ba'i bgo bsha' dag kyang /
analyzed: longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' dang / 'tsho ba'i bgo bsha' dag kyang /
translated: He is generous with his wealth and generous with his life.

original: 'bri ba skyung ma byas /🔽bskyang ba ma byas /🔽gya gyu ma byas /🔽yi chad par ma byas par yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mgu bar bya sla zhing /
analyzed: 'bri ba skyung ma byas / bskyang ba ma byas / gya gyu ma byas / yi chad par ma byas par yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mgu bar bya sla zhing /
translated: He does not write down his debts.🔽He does not forget to look after them.🔽He does not deceive them.🔽He does not abandon them.

original: mgu bar bya mi dka' ba yin te /
analyzed: mgu bar bya mi dka' ba yin te /
translated: He is easy to please and not difficult to please.

original: de ltar na rgyal po bya dga' che ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyal po bya dga' che ba yin no //
translated: In this way, the king has great rewards.

original: ji ltar na dam pa rnams kyi ngag nyan pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na dam pa rnams kyi ngag nyan pa yin zhe na /
translated: “How do such kings listen to the speech of the holy?

original: 'di la rgyal po gang zag mkhas la mkhas par mi rlom pa /
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po gang zag mkhas la mkhas par mi rlom pa /
translated: Here, the king listens to the speech of those who are learned, who do not boast of their learning,

original: brkam chags med pa /
analyzed: brkam chags med pa /
translated: who are not greedy,

original: nye mgon mi byed pa /
analyzed: nye mgon mi byed pa /
translated: who do not favor their relatives,

original: tshul shes pa /
analyzed: tshul shes pa /
translated: who know propriety,

original: 'khu bar mi byed pa /
analyzed: 'khu bar mi byed pa /
translated: who do not deceive,

original: chos dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i gang zag rnams kyi tshig mnyan pa dang / bya bar sems shing /🔽des ni de bya ba dag gis kyang 'phel bar 'gyur /
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i gang zag rnams kyi tshig mnyan pa dang / bya bar sems shing / des ni de bya ba dag gis kyang 'phel bar 'gyur /
translated: and who are righteous. He thinks about what they say.🔽He is enriched by what he does for them.

original: longs spyod pa dag gis kyang 'phel bar 'gyur /
analyzed: longs spyod pa dag gis kyang 'phel bar 'gyur /
translated: He is enriched by his enjoyment of them.

original: grags pas kyang 'phel bar 'gyur /
analyzed: grags pas kyang 'phel bar 'gyur /
translated: and his fame will increase.

original: chos kyi kyang 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi kyang 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: and his Dharma will increase.

original: de ltar na rgyal po dam pa rnams kyi dag mnyan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyal po dam pa rnams kyi dag mnyan pa yin no //
translated: This is how the best of kings is a good listener.

original: ji ltar na brtags te byed cing chos lugs dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na brtags te byed cing chos lugs dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
translated: “How is it that he acts after examination and is righteous?

original: 'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams mthun par bskos /🔽yongs su bskos /🔽rnam par brtags /
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams mthun par bskos / yongs su bskos / rnam par brtags /
translated: Here the king gathers together the people of the forest,🔽he assembles them,🔽he examines them,

original: kun du brtags nas /
analyzed: kun du brtags nas /
translated: and he investigates them.

original: don mchog tu yid brtan par bya ba'i las kyi mtha' de dang de dag tu bsko bar mi 'os pa'i tshal za rnams ni sko bar mi byed /
analyzed: don mchog tu yid brtan par bya ba'i las kyi mtha' de dang de dag tu bsko bar mi 'os pa'i tshal za rnams ni sko bar mi byed /
translated: He does not appoint to any position those people of the forest who are not fit to be appointed,

original: bsko bar 'os pa rnams ni sko bar byed /
analyzed: bsko bar 'os pa rnams ni sko bar byed /
translated: and he does appoint those who are fit to be appointed.

original: las kyi mtha' de dang de dag las dbyung bar 'os pa'i tshal za rnams ni 'byin par byed /
analyzed: las kyi mtha' de dang de dag las dbyung bar 'os pa'i tshal za rnams ni 'byin par byed /
translated: He dismisses from their positions those people of the forest who are fit to be dismissed,

original: dbyung bar mi 'os pa rnams ni 'byin par mi byed /
analyzed: dbyung bar mi 'os pa rnams ni 'byin par mi byed /
translated: and he does not dismiss those who are not fit to be dismissed.

original: phan gdags par 'os pa'i tshal za rnams la ni legs pa phan 'dogs par byed /
analyzed: phan gdags par 'os pa'i tshal za rnams la ni legs pa phan 'dogs par byed /
translated: He benefits those people of the forest who are fit to be benefited,🔽and he punishes those who are fit to be punished.

original: chad pas gcad par 'os pa rnams la ni chad pas gcod par byed cing /🔽bya ba rnams la yang rjes su brtags nas byed kyi gya tshom du mi byed pa dang / rgyal po rgyal po'i chos lugs gang dag yin pa de dag kyang tshal za rnams la legs par rnam par gzhag pas des na de'i tshal za rnams kyang blon po chen po rnams dang /
analyzed: chad pas gcad par 'os pa rnams la ni chad pas gcod par byed cing / bya ba rnams la yang rjes su brtags nas byed kyi gya tshom du mi byed pa dang / rgyal po rgyal po'i chos lugs gang dag yin pa de dag kyang tshal za rnams la legs par rnam par gzhag pas des na de'i tshal za rnams kyang blon po chen po rnams dang /
translated: Those who deserve to be punished are punished.🔽He does not act rashly but acts after examining what should be done.🔽He is well-established in the royal duties of the brahmins.

original: 'khor phal po che 'dus te 'dug pa'i tshe glo bur du gtam mi zer zhing /
analyzed: 'khor phal po che 'dus te 'dug pa'i tshe glo bur du gtam mi zer zhing /
translated: Therefore, when the brahmins are assembled in the great assembly of the king and his retinue, he does not suddenly speak.

original: gtam gyi mjug sdod pa dang / rjes dang bcas pa dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dag smra zhing bya bar yang sems la /
analyzed: gtam gyi mjug sdod pa dang / rjes dang bcas pa dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dag smra zhing bya bar yang sems la /
translated: He speaks with a conclusion to his speech, with a following, and with respect, and he thinks about what should be done.

original: ji ltar bsgo ba'i tshig bzhin du yang byed cing /🔽tshig @155a * //
analyzed: ji ltar bsgo ba'i tshig bzhin du yang byed cing / tshig @155a * //
translated: He acts in accordance with the words he has given,

original: la legs par gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: la legs par gnas pa yin te /
translated: and he is well-established in his words.

original: de ltar na rgyal po brtags te byed cing chos lugs dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyal po brtags te byed cing chos lugs dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: Thus the king acts after examination and possesses the royal duties.

original: ji ltar na chos la lta ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na chos la lta ba yin zhe na /
translated: How does he have the view of the Dharma?

original: 'di la rgyal po 'jig rten pha rol la dad cing yid ches pa skyes pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po 'jig rten pha rol la dad cing yid ches pa skyes pa yin te /
translated: The king has faith and confidence in the next world.

original: de 'jig rten pha rol la dad cing yid ches pa skyes pas las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyi 'bras bu phyis tshe phyi ma la 'dod pa dang mi 'dod par 'gyur ba la yang dad par byed pa dang / dad pas ngo tsha dang ldan zhing lus dang ngag dang /
analyzed: de 'jig rten pha rol la dad cing yid ches pa skyes pas las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyi 'bras bu phyis tshe phyi ma la 'dod pa dang mi 'dod par 'gyur ba la yang dad par byed pa dang / dad pas ngo tsha dang ldan zhing lus dang ngag dang /
translated: Because he has faith and confidence in the next world, he believes in the results of virtuous and nonvirtuous actions, and in the future life, he will experience what is desirable and undesirable.🔽Because of his faith, he is conscientious and does not engage in misconduct with his body, speech, and mind.

original: yid kyis nyes par spyod pa la ci 'dod dgur mi 'jug pa dang / gzhan yang dus dus su so sor brtags nas sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin pa dang / bsod nams dag byed pa dang / bsnyen gnas la gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba la 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: yid kyis nyes par spyod pa la ci 'dod dgur mi 'jug pa dang / gzhan yang dus dus su so sor brtags nas sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin pa dang / bsod nams dag byed pa dang / bsnyen gnas la gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba la 'jug pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, from time to time, he gives gifts after careful consideration, he performs meritorious deeds, he observes the one-day fasting observance, and he undertakes the precepts of ethical discipline.

original: de ltar na rgyal po chos la lta ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyal po chos la lta ba yin no //
translated: In this way, the king is one who observes the Dharma.

original: ji ltar na bye brag shes shing byas pa gzo ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na bye brag shes shing byas pa gzo ba yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that he knows the difference and is grateful?

original: 'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams dang / blo grogs rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / gros grogs rnams la /
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams dang / blo grogs rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / gros grogs rnams la /
translated: “The king should know his retinue of ministers, his friends, his ministers, and his advisors.

original: 'di lta ste gus pa dang / nus pa dang / shes pa las kyang sems phyin ci log tu ma gyur cing /
analyzed: 'di lta ste gus pa dang / nus pa dang / shes pa las kyang sems phyin ci log tu ma gyur cing /
translated: He should know their minds, which are not distorted by respect, ability, or knowledge.

original: de'i tshal za gang dag gus pa dang mi ldan pa de dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes la /
analyzed: de'i tshal za gang dag gus pa dang mi ldan pa de dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes la /
translated: He should know exactly those who are not respectful.

original: gang dag nus pa dang mi ldan pa dag dang / gang dag shes rab 'chal pa de dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / tshal za gang dag gus pa dang ldan pa de dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes la /
analyzed: gang dag nus pa dang mi ldan pa dag dang / gang dag shes rab 'chal pa de dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / tshal za gang dag gus pa dang ldan pa de dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes la /
translated: He should know exactly those who are not able and those who are unwise. He should know exactly those who are respectful.

original: gang dag nus pa dang ldan pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa de dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / tshal za gang dag gus pa dang mi ldan pa dang / nus pa dang mi ldan pa dang /
analyzed: gang dag nus pa dang ldan pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa de dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / tshal za gang dag gus pa dang mi ldan pa dang / nus pa dang mi ldan pa dang /
translated: Those who are capable and have wisdom will understand it correctly,

original: shes rab 'chal pa de dag la ni khyad gsod par byed /
analyzed: shes rab 'chal pa de dag la ni khyad gsod par byed /
translated: but those who are disrespectful, incapable, and have poor wisdom will be disparaged.

original: yongs su spong bar byed la /
analyzed: yongs su spong bar byed la /
translated: They will be rejected.

original: tshal za gang dag gus pa dang ldan pa dang / nus pa dang ldan pa dang ; shes rab dang ldan pa de dag la ni /
analyzed: tshal za gang dag gus pa dang ldan pa dang / nus pa dang ldan pa dang ; shes rab dang ldan pa de dag la ni /
translated: Those who are respectful, capable, and have wisdom

original: bkur stir byed /🔽bla mar byed /🔽ri mor byed /
analyzed: bkur stir byed / bla mar byed / ri mor byed /
translated: will be honored,🔽held in high regard,🔽and revered.

original: mchod par byed cing /
analyzed: mchod par byed cing /
translated: They will be offered worship,🔽and they will be helped in every way.

original: legs pa kho nar phan 'dogs par yang byed pa dang / de'i tshal za yun ring po nas bsnyen bkur byed byed pa /
analyzed: legs pa kho nar phan 'dogs par yang byed pa dang / de'i tshal za yun ring po nas bsnyen bkur byed byed pa /
translated: Those who have long served and attended to the teacher

original: rgan po rgas pa dgog tu phyin pa sri zhu che ba gang dag yin pa @155b de dag la mthu med pa dang / stobs med pa dang / nyams rtsal med par rig kyang sngon gyi byas ba rjes su dran pas bsnyen bkur las kyang khyad du gsod par mi byed /
analyzed: rgan po rgas pa dgog tu phyin pa sri zhu che ba gang dag yin pa @155b de dag la mthu med pa dang / stobs med pa dang / nyams rtsal med par rig kyang sngon gyi byas ba rjes su dran pas bsnyen bkur las kyang khyad du gsod par mi byed /
translated: He is grateful to those who were helpful to him when he was a young man, even though he knows that they are now old, feeble, weak, and frail. He does not slight them because he remembers what they did for him in the past.

original: longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' dang / 'tsho ba'i bgo bsha' las kyang khyad du gsod par mi byed pa yin te /
analyzed: longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' dang / 'tsho ba'i bgo bsha' las kyang khyad du gsod par mi byed pa yin te /
translated: He does not slight them by excluding them from the distribution of wealth and the distribution of provisions.

original: de ltar na rgyal po bye brag shes shing byas pa gzo ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyal po bye brag shes shing byas pa gzo ba yin no //
translated: In this way, the king is discerning and grateful.

original: ji ltar na rab tu ma myos shing gcig tu bag yod par gnas pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na rab tu ma myos shing gcig tu bag yod par gnas pa yin zhe na /
translated: “How is it that the king is not deranged and remains focused on what is essential?

original: 'di la rgyal po dus dus su bya ba dag bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang / tshal za dag gso ba'i phyir brtson pa dang dus dus su 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas rtse bar byed /
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po dus dus su bya ba dag bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang / tshal za dag gso ba'i phyir brtson pa dang dus dus su 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas rtse bar byed /
translated: From time to time, the king is diligent in his duties, diligent in caring for the gardens, and from time to time, he enjoys himself, takes part in entertainments, and indulges in the five sense pleasures.

original: dga' bar byed /
analyzed: dga' bar byed /
translated: He enjoys himself and takes part in entertainments.

original: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa yin te /
translated: and he enjoys himself.

original: de ltar na rgyal po rab tu ma myos shing /
analyzed: de ltar na rgyal po rab tu ma myos shing /
translated: In this way, a king is not completely insane,

original: gcig tu bag yod par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: gcig tu bag yod par gnas pa yin no //
translated: and he abides in a single state of heedfulness.

original: rgyal po chen po rgyal po'i yon tan bcu po de dag dang ldan na rgyal po longs spyod che ba ma yin zhing /🔽rtsa 'jing che ba ma yin la /
analyzed: rgyal po chen po rgyal po'i yon tan bcu po de dag dang ldan na rgyal po longs spyod che ba ma yin zhing / rtsa 'jing che ba ma yin la /
translated: “Great King, if a king possesses these ten royal virtues, then even if he does not have great wealth,🔽does not have a great family lineage,

original: 'khor mang ba ma yin du zin kyang /🔽skyabs kyi 'os yin zhing /
analyzed: 'khor mang ba ma yin du zin kyang / skyabs kyi 'os yin zhing /
translated: and does not have a large retinue,🔽he is still worthy of being a refuge

original: mngon du bgrod par bya ba'i 'os yin no //
analyzed: mngon du bgrod par bya ba'i 'os yin no //
translated: and worthy of being approached.

original: rgyal po chen po rgyal po'i yon tan bcu po de dag las dang po gcig ni rigs kyi yon tan yin no //
analyzed: rgyal po chen po rgyal po'i yon tan bcu po de dag las dang po gcig ni rigs kyi yon tan yin no //
translated: “Great King, among these ten royal virtues, the first one is a virtue of family,

original: de las gzhan pa dgu ni rang bzhin gyi yon tan yin par rig par bya'o /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa dgu ni rang bzhin gyi yon tan yin par rig par bya'o /
translated: and the other nine should be known as virtues of nature.

original: // / bam po bcu bdun pa dang / nyams pa'i sgo dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: // / bam po bcu bdun pa dang / nyams pa'i sgo dag gang zhe na /
translated: What are the doors to decline?

original: rgyal po nyams pa'i sgo ni lnga ste /
analyzed: rgyal po nyams pa'i sgo ni lnga ste /
translated: There are five doors to a king’s decline:

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: tshal za ma brtags pa len pa rgyal po'i nyams pa'i sgo dang / tshal za brtags pa len kyang mi snyan pa dang dus ma yin par spyod pa rgyal po'i nyams pa'i sgo dang / bya ba bsam pa la bag med pa rgyal po'i nyams pa'i sgo dang /
analyzed: tshal za ma brtags pa len pa rgyal po'i nyams pa'i sgo dang / tshal za brtags pa len kyang mi snyan pa dang dus ma yin par spyod pa rgyal po'i nyams pa'i sgo dang / bya ba bsam pa la bag med pa rgyal po'i nyams pa'i sgo dang /

analyzed: longs spyod bsrung ba la bag med pa rgyal po'i nyams pa'i sgo dang / chos spyad pa la bag med pa rgyal po'i nyams pa'i sgo'o //
translated: “What is the king’s fault of not examining the food that is eaten?🔽“What is the king’s fault of not examining the food that is eaten?

analyzed: de la tshal za ma brtags pa len pa gang zhe na / rgyal po chen po 'di la rgyal po tshal za rnams gus pa dang / nus pa dang ; shes pa las kyang mthun par ma bskos /
translated: “What is the king’s fault of not examining the food that is eaten?🔽“What is the king’s fault of not examining the food that is eaten?🔽“What is the king’s fault of not examining the food that is eaten?🔽“What is the king’s fault of not examining the food that is eaten?

original: yongs su ma bskos /🔽dmigs su ma phab /🔽rnam par ma brtags /
analyzed: yongs su ma bskos / dmigs su ma phab / rnam par ma brtags /
translated: “What is the king’s fault of not examining the food that is eaten?🔽“What is the king’s fault of not examining the food that is eaten?🔽“What is the king’s fault of not examining the food that is eaten?

original: kun du ma brtags par nye bar 'jog par byed /
analyzed: kun du ma brtags par nye bar 'jog par byed /
translated: “What is the king’s fault of not examining the food that is eaten?

original: rim gro byed cing de la longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' dang / 'tsho ba'i bgo bsha' yang yongs su rdzogs par byed la /
analyzed: rim gro byed cing de la longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' dang / 'tsho ba'i bgo bsha' yang yongs su rdzogs par byed la /
translated: He shares his possessions and his livelihood with them.

original: @156a * // de dag mchog tu yid brtan par bya ba'i gnas dag tu bsgo zhing /
analyzed: @156a * // de dag mchog tu yid brtan par bya ba'i gnas dag tu bsgo zhing /
translated: He entrusts them with the most confidential matters.

original: yid rton par yang byed la /
analyzed: yid rton par yang byed la /
translated: He trusts them.

original: dus dus su tshig gi lam 'jam po dag kun du rjod par yang byed pas /
analyzed: dus dus su tshig gi lam 'jam po dag kun du rjod par yang byed pas /
translated: He speaks to them with gentle words from time to time.

original: de dag de'i rdzas bzhag pa la yang 'khu bar byed /
analyzed: de dag de'i rdzas bzhag pa la yang 'khu bar byed /
translated: He does not steal their possessions.

original: gsod pa rnams dang / dgra bo rnams dang / phyir rgol ba rnams dang / g-yul sprod pa na de dag thog ma kho nar pham par gyur /
analyzed: gsod pa rnams dang / dgra bo rnams dang / phyir rgol ba rnams dang / g-yul sprod pa na de dag thog ma kho nar pham par gyur /
translated: When they are in battle with enemies, adversaries, or rivals, they are the first to be defeated,

original: 'jigs par gyur /🔽nyams par gyur /
analyzed: 'jigs par gyur / nyams par gyur /
translated: to be frightened,🔽to be destroyed,

original: gzhan brgyal bar gyur /
analyzed: gzhan brgyal bar gyur /
translated: to faint,

original: rgyab ston par gyur cing 'byer bar byed la /
analyzed: rgyab ston par gyur cing 'byer bar byed la /
translated: to turn their backs, and to flee.

original: tshul ngan pa'i sbyor ba dag gis kyang bya ba dag chud gson par byed pa de dag ni de'i tshal za ma brtags pa len pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: tshul ngan pa'i sbyor ba dag gis kyang bya ba dag chud gson par byed pa de dag ni de'i tshal za ma brtags pa len pa zhes bya'o //

translated: The action of this is called “conscientiousness with regard to thoughts.”

original: longs spyod bsrung ba la bag yod pa gang zhe na /🔽'di la rgyal po las kyi mtha' rgya chen po la sbyor ba dang / las kyi mtha' bzang po la sbyor ba dang / las kyi mtha'i zhal ta legs par byas pa dang / las kyi mtha' la legs par so sor brtags pa dang ; rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo legs par bsrungs pa dang /
analyzed: longs spyod bsrung ba la bag yod pa gang zhe na / 'di la rgyal po las kyi mtha' rgya chen po la sbyor ba dang / las kyi mtha' bzang po la sbyor ba dang / las kyi mtha'i zhal ta legs par byas pa dang / las kyi mtha' la legs par so sor brtags pa dang ; rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo legs par bsrungs pa dang /
translated: What is conscientiousness with regard to protecting possessions?🔽Here, a king is engaged in vast activities, engaged in good activities, well-advised with regard to activities, well-examined with regard to activities, and the door of the king’s palace is well-guarded.

original: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgo legs par bsrungs pa dang / mdzod dang  ba legs par bsrungs pa dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgo legs par bsrungs pa dang / mdzod dang  ba legs par bsrungs pa dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: The door of the harem is well-guarded, the door of the treasury is well-guarded, and the king is not negligent with regard to the four royal duties.

original: bro gar mkhan dang / zlos gar mkhan dang / bzhad gad mkhan dang / 'jo sgeg mkhan la sogs pa la longs spyod tshod rigs par gtong ba dang / cho lo dang rgyan dor gyi nyes rtsom la shin du ma zhugs pa de ni de'i longs spyod bsrung ba la bag yod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bro gar mkhan dang / zlos gar mkhan dang / bzhad gad mkhan dang / 'jo sgeg mkhan la sogs pa la longs spyod tshod rigs par gtong ba dang / cho lo dang rgyan dor gyi nyes rtsom la shin du ma zhugs pa de ni de'i longs spyod bsrung ba la bag yod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: He is not excessively involved in gambling, games, and frivolous activities. This is called “being conscientious in protecting his wealth.”

original: chos spyod pa la bag yod pa gang zhe na /🔽'di la rgyal po de'i phebs pa'i yul na /
analyzed: chos spyod pa la bag yod pa gang zhe na / 'di la rgyal po de'i phebs pa'i yul na /
translated: “What is conscientious engagement in the Dharma?”

original: dge sbyong dang bram ze rang bzhin dge @158a * //
analyzed: dge sbyong dang bram ze rang bzhin dge @158a * //
translated: In this case, the king, from time to time, visits those ascetics and brahmins who are naturally virtuous,🔽who are renowned for their virtue,

original: bar grags pa /
analyzed: bar grags pa /
translated: who are wise,🔽clear,

original: mdzangs pa / gsal pa /
analyzed: mdzangs pa / gsal pa /
translated: intelligent,

original: rigs pa / grol ba /🔽mkhas pa / gnod par bya ba ma yin pa /
analyzed: rigs pa / grol ba / mkhas pa / gnod par bya ba ma yin pa /
translated: liberated,

original: gnod par bya ba ma yin pas dga' ba gang dag yin pa de dag gi drung du dus dus su song ste /
analyzed: gnod par bya ba ma yin pas dga' ba gang dag yin pa de dag gi drung du dus dus su song ste /
translated: and learned, who are not to be censured, and who are loved by those who are not to be censured.

original: dge ba gang yin /🔽mi dge ba gang yin /
analyzed: dge ba gang yin / mi dge ba gang yin /
translated: He asks them, “What is virtuous?🔽What is nonvirtuous?

original: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang yin /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang yin /
translated: What is blameworthy?

original: kha na ma tho ba med pa gang yin /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med pa gang yin /
translated: What is not blameworthy?

original: ci zhig byas na legs pa dang sdig pa med par 'gyur zhes yongs su dri bar byed /
analyzed: ci zhig byas na legs pa dang sdig pa med par 'gyur zhes yongs su dri bar byed /
translated: What is good and what is bad?

original: yongs su zhu bar byed pa dang / de dag las thos na yang de lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin pa dang / bsod nams dag byed pa dang ; bsnyen gnas la gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba la 'jug pa de ni de'i chos spyad pa la bag yod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su zhu bar byed pa dang / de dag las thos na yang de lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin pa dang / bsod nams dag byed pa dang ; bsnyen gnas la gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba la 'jug pa de ni de'i chos spyad pa la bag yod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: And having heard it from them, he practices accordingly, gives gifts, makes merit, observes the Uposatha, and engages in taking up the precepts of virtue. This is called his heedfulness in practicing the Dharma.

original: lnga po de dag ni rgyal po'i thabs kyi sgo dag yin te /
analyzed: lnga po de dag ni rgyal po'i thabs kyi sgo dag yin te /
translated: These are the five doors of a king’s counsel.

original: de dag dang ldan na rgyal po tshe 'di pa'i don las kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: de dag dang ldan na rgyal po tshe 'di pa'i don las kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur la /
translated: If a king possesses them, he will not fail in the aims of this life.

original: tshe phyi ma pa'i don las kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshe phyi ma pa'i don las kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not fail in the aims of the next life either.

original: de la thabs kyi sgo dang po bzhis ni tshe 'di pa'i don las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la thabs kyi sgo dang po bzhis ni tshe 'di pa'i don las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Through the first four doors of counsel, he will not fail in the aims of this life.

original: thabs kyi sgo tha ma gcig gis ni tshe phyi ma pa'i don las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thabs kyi sgo tha ma gcig gis ni tshe phyi ma pa'i don las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The last of these means does not cause one to fall away from the goal of the next life.🔽What are the five things that a king desires, finds attractive, enjoys, and delights in?🔽They are these:🔽the people’s affection,

original: rgyal po rnams kyi 'dod pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na ;
analyzed: rgyal po rnams kyi 'dod pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na ;
translated: mastery,🔽subjugation of enemies,🔽physical well-being,🔽and rebirth in a happy realm.🔽What are the five things that a king desires, finds attractive, enjoys, and delights in?🔽They are these:

analyzed: rgyal po'i 'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong bar bya ba'i chos ni lnga po 'di dag ste /
